question: What are some of the most unusual inventions in history, and can you generate an image of one of them?

steps.content: What are some of the most unusual inventions in history, and can you generate an image of one of them?
Plan: 1) Search for unusual inventions in history. 2) Select one invention for image generation. 3) Generate an image of the selected invention. 4) Return the answer.
Searching for unusual inventions in history.
Some unusual inventions include the cat piano, the baby cage, and the anti-pervert hair leg stockings.
Plan: Select the cat piano for image generation.
Generating an image of the cat piano.
Image of the cat piano generated.
Can you tell me more about how the cat piano works?
Plan: 1) Search for information on how the cat piano works. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for information on how the cat piano works.

The cat piano was a conceptual musical instrument where cats were placed in a row with their tails stretched under a keyboard. When a key was pressed, it would strike the tail of a cat, causing it to meow at a specific pitch.
